item.title: About
item.description: Hi ! I’m Abhishek Chauhan. I graduated from IIT Kharagpur in 2019. I am currently a Software Enginner at Google, Bengaluru.

For Sal In your embrace, my world finds light, A symphony of joy, tender and bright. Each moment with you, a sweet melody, In your love, I find pure serenity. You paint my days with colors rare, In your arms, I find solace, I swear. Grateful I am, for your love so true, With you, my love, life’s hues renew. From Chau
